intro: Meibomia micheliana, commonly known as the African violet, is a flowering plant native to tropical Africa. It belongs to the family Gesneriaceae and is characterized by its compact, bushy growth habit. The plant features velvety, dark green leaves and produces showy, tubular flowers in shades of pink, purple, and white. It thrives in humid, well-drained soil and requires indirect sunlight for optimal growth. Meibomia micheliana is popular as a houseplant due to its ornamental value and ease of care.
